metadata.description: Verbatim customer quotes from depth interviews and surveys

value_perception.quote: £25 for a family meal delivered? That's cheaper than cooking sometimes, especially when you factor in the time.
I love that I don't have to think about what to cook. It's decision fatigue relief.
The value is there but I wish there was more variety in healthy options.

variety_importance.quote: My kids want pizza, I want something spicier - we need options that work for everyone.
We rotate cuisines throughout the week. Monday Chinese, Wednesday Indian, Friday fish and chips.
Would love more Mexican options in my area. We always struggle to find good tacos.

kids_needs.quote: If my 7-year-old won't eat it, we're not ordering. She's super fussy.
The kids menu options are great. Finally something that's not just nuggets.
Need milder curry options for the kids. They can't handle the spice.

barriers.quote: Sometimes the restaurant I want isn't available in my area. That's frustrating.
The £25 limit means I sometimes can't add dessert. Would pay a bit more for flexibility.
Delivery times are long during peak hours. Friday night is painful.

satisfaction_drivers.quote: When it works, it's brilliant. Hot food, good portions, everyone's happy.
The app makes it so easy. Pick a cuisine, pick a restaurant, done in 30 seconds.
I've recommended it to three friends already. They all signed up.
